This is simple js and css loader.



<!--Wallpaper-->
<!--âš ï¸WARNING: This section was generated by https://github.com/hejny/batch-project-editor/blob/main/src//workflows/315-ai-generated-wallpaper/4-aiGeneratedWallpaperUseInReadme.ts so every manual change will be overwritten.-->
[![Wallpaper of ğŸŒ Loader](assets/ai/wallpaper/gallery/ba8a8600-1977-4a33-89e0-3831e8e6fa75-0_0.png)](https://www.midjourney.com/app/jobs/ba8a8600-1977-4a33-89e0-3831e8e6fa75)
<!--/Wallpaper-->

## Usage:

Thare should be provided one of these options:
?loader=async
?loader=sync-redirect
?loader=json

### In the sync and json loader should be also:
?version=[Semantic version]
?type=[js|css|*]

### In async loader should be:
?function=[loaderFunctionName]

### Async loader usage

Async loader requires jQuery to be included in window.

```javascript
window.loaderFunctionName(
{
version: '*',
type: 'js'
},
()=>{
//now you can use loaded scripts
}
);
```
